titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that King Gyanendra should immediately release all political detainees, restore constitutional liberties, and undertake good faith negotiations with all involved parties to restore democracy.

Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that King Gyanendra should immediately release all political detainees, restore constitutional liberties, and undertake good faith negotiations with all involved parties to restore democracy.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

term.name: Civil Rights and Liberties, Minority Issues

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that: (1) King Gyanendra should release all political detainees, restore constitutional liberties, and undertake good faith negotiations with the leaders of Nepal's political parties to restore democracy and an elected government; and (2) all involved parties should put aside past differences and enter into a new phase of peaceful and good faith negotiations.
